content: this easy bookmark crochet pattern is a beginner-friendly pattern which can be made in under half an hour and uses only 25 yds of yarn it s a perfect crochet gift idea for absolutely anyone and is also great to sell at craft shows about this crochet bookmark pattern - this is a very easy pattern it s a great crochet pattern for beginners that works up really quickly in under 30 min approx - it s a perfect crochet gift idea for anyone and for any occasion who doesn t need a bookmark - the pattern includes step by step instructions as well as a full video tutorial - the pattern is completely customizable so you can easily adjust the width and height of the bookmark - instructions include how to make and attach the tassels onto the bookmark
